title: SLS Schedule
text:
This page details the 2024 Student Led Symposium (SLS) schedule, to the extent it is currently known. Question marks indicate uncertainty, no question mark means the schedule is confirmed. Scroll down and you may see yourself.
The schedule is jointly overseen by Benjamin Dutton and Aengus Roberts.

title: Home Page
text:
Welcome to the SAMBa 2024/2025 Student Led Symposium (SLS) schedule.
For those that might not know SAMBa = Statistical Applied Mathematics at Bath.
